column5: Perfect for Brownsville TX. traveling, Port Isabel South Padre ;13 WKS. RN; Very large one bedroom with chic interior, tile flooring, very clean, close to beach & Brownsville Medical Center ,boat slip for your boat/canoe, 2 car covered parking, swimming pool. It is our second home for 15 years. Relaxing with all imaginable furnishings and comfort to ensure the home feeling as possible. Two flat screen TV. fast WF
